hud.helpText: Stand still, then triple tap your interact keybind to 'Ready Up' or configure Match Settings
hud.roundLiveHelpFormat: First to {0} Vehicle Kills Wins the Round

overLine.title: {0} IS OVER THE LINE!
overLine.subtitle: Everyone must return to their main base and ready back up

notifications.readyupReturnToBaseNotLive: Return to main base and ready back up - Round {0} is not live!
notifications.roundOverRedeploying: Round over, redeploying to reset in {0}s...

joinPrompt.title: Welcome to TWL Vehicles Only Combat

body.mandatory1:
IMPORTANT: to start the game...
 - While on foot: stand still! Then TRIPLE TAP YOUR INTERACT KEYBIND within 2 seconds
 - The interact keybind defaults to 'E' on PC
 - For consoles: interact defaults to 'Square' (PS5) or 'X' (X-Box)

If you have issues with this, ensure your interact keybind is set to 'tap', not 'hold':
Settings > Controller > Infantry > Edit Settings > Infantry > Edit Control Settings > Other
 - Ensure that your "Interact" is set to "Tap".
 - If this STILL does not work for you, interact is immediately available on respawn only.

This dialog will continue to show...
...until you successfully triple tap interact...
body.mandatory2:
This is round based Vehicular Combat:
 - 'Ready Up' to start the game. Don't leave the main base until countdown ends...
 - Everyone gets 1 life, and 1 vehicle only!
 - Rounds are 5 minutes long.
 - It's a "Best of X" format, you decide how many Rounds to play (Default: 3).
 - Map victory is decided by rounds won (e.g. if you win 2 out of 3 rounds).
 - Round ties (and thus map ties) are possible due to rounds timing out.
 - Tie-breakers will be added in the future.
body.tip3:
This experience supports 1v1, 2v2, 3v3 and 4v4 configurations!
 - Select the desired format while the 'Ready Up' screen is visible, (upper right corner).
 - Vehicles take a moment to spawn, so wait a moment while the mode changes.
 - If you go down in size (e.g. from '3v3' to '2v2') the extra vehicles will not respawn again.
 - Vehicles are curated for these maps, use what is provided!
 - Teams get mirror match-ups, the same vehicle types spawn for both teams.
body.tip4:
We are limited by the inability to change vehicle loadouts mid-game:
 - Your loadout is locked once in-game; reconnect to choose a different vehicle loadout.
 - You can change your Engineer sub-class (Combat Engineer is optimal).
 - Vehicle performance and damage modeling is unchanged from vanilla BF6.
body.tip5:
Positioning at the round start is up to the players:
 - The opening moments of a round are impactful!
 - Position intelligently at the start to flank, or setup ambushes.
 - If you cross the main base thresholds before countdown ends, return to the main base.
body.tip6:
All gadgets except torch and supply crates are banned:
 - Despite what is selected, you will only get these two gadgets by design.
 - Leaving or entering your main base resupplies your vehicle ammo crates.
 - Ammo resupply boxes, if unused, will persist between rounds.
body.tip7:
Vehicles marked 'abandoned' slowly take damage over time:
 - This experience is curated for Vehicles only, do not stray too far from them.
 - After 5m, if no players are within this range they are classified as 'abandoned'.
 - Abandoned Vehicles take damage slowly; they can be repaired back up if needed.
 - Vehicles destroyed by abandonment still award points during a live round.
body.tip8:
The captain goes down with his ship:
 - Repairing your friends is allowed, as long as your vehicle is still standing.
 - If you lose your vehicle, please redeploy and let the round play out without you.
 - You can repair torch enemy vehicles but only as long as your own vehicle is still in play.
body.tip9:
Vehicle Registration is required for scoring accuracy:
 - If you see no 'registration' message when entering a vehicle, get out and get back in.
 - If round results are innaccurate, you can address this with the admin panel.
body.tip10:
Be a sportsman, not a dingus:
 - It is encouraged to set your chat to configure to display when there is activity.
 - Communicate with your opponent when you have bugs, issues, or need to pause.
 - Agreements made in chat should be binding: have fun and try different things.
body.tip11:
This Experience is in active development! If bugs occur...
 - Access the Admin Panel in the top right while the 'Ready Up' screen is visible.
 - The Admin panel has global audit messaging and admin action counts.
 - Opening or using the Admin panel gives a global notification for all to see.
 - If any Admin buttons are used, the victory dialog shows this for awareness / visibility.
 - The Admin panel is for fixing innocent mistakes only (avoid using it unless necessary).
body.tip12:
There are many experience codes available for this game mode (ZMCYW: All 8 Maps)
 - ZMC3A: Area 22B
 - ZMC44: Blackwell Fields
 - ZMC52: Defense Nexus
 - ZMC5P: Golf Course
 - ZMC7Y: Liberation Peak
 - ZMC87: Mahattan Bridge
 - ZMC9S: Operation Firestorm
 - ZMC9Y: Mirak Valley
body.tip13:
If extra vehicles remain in the main base from toggling down a mode.
(e.g. going from 3v3 to 2v2)
 - It's best to blow these vehicles up before the round starts.
 - Anti-spawn camp detection protects against getting points
 - But this triggers only if they're destroyed during their origin.
 - Do not abuse this feature, that'd be a douchey thing to do.
body.tip14: 14-skip: remove from JOIN_PROMPT_BODY_SEQUENCE_SKIP_KEYS in order to display
body.tip15: 15-skip: remove from JOIN_PROMPT_BODY_SEQUENCE_SKIP_KEYS in order to display

readyDialog.header: Everyone needs to press 'Ready' and stay inside their main base until the round starts. You get 1 vehicle & life per round.
readyDialog.header2: Only vehicle kills award points! Repair vehicles with your torch & resupply vehicle ammo with supply crates - but stay close to your vehicles...
readyDialog.header3: Vehicles will become 'abandoned' and slowly take damage over time - eventually blowing up if it's >{0}m from any player.
readyDialog.bestOfChanged: {0} changed it to best of {1} rounds

tester.header: t1 = left team; t2 = right team

victory.roundsSummaryFormat: {0} Rounds played in a best of {1} Rounds matchup
victory.screenshotPrompt: Screenshot this to record match results

messages.pointAwardedWithOwner: +1 Kill for {0} - {1}'s vehicle was destroyed! ({2} Round Kills)
messages.vehicleDestroyedNotLive: {0}'s {1} vehicle was destroyed - but round was not live (no points awarded)
messages.vehicleSpawnRetry: Vehicle spawn blocked for {0}. Retrying in {1}s.
messages.vehicleCampedInMainBase: Vehicle was spawn camped in {0} Main Base at X:{1}
messages.vehicleStolenRegister: Vehicle stolen and registered for {0} by {1}.
messages.vehicleRegistrationNoChange: {0} entered a registered vehicle for {1} (no change).
messages.vehicleRegistrationPendingTeam: {0} entered a vehicle, registration pending team assignment.
messages.vehicleRegisteredNew: Vehicle registered for {0} by {1} (spawn Auto-registration failed?!).
messages.vehicleReturned: {0} has returned to their registered vehicle for {1}.
